amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to pay for the transfers or relocations of senior executives of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2774 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2774 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 2763. (consideration: CR S7878-7881; text: CR S7879) To prohibit the use of funds to pay for the transfers or relocations of senior executives of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2774 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2774 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 2763.
